title: New: Main Attrakionz – Brock Lesnar
body:
CITR’s FAVORITE LABEL IN THE WHOLE FUCKING WORLD, or as you guys know them [**‘Crash Symbols’**](http://www.facebook.com/crashsymbols), dropped a new new [compilation Mixtape](http://crashsymbols.bandcamp.com/album/dope-mountain-fuck-vol-2) yesterday. It was brimming with gems, as expected, yet a new cut from **[Main Attrakionz](http://www.ontaskfamily.com/)** is perhaps the most obsessively repeatable.

Apparently Brock Lesnar is a pro wrestler reference, “Their new track “Brock Lesnar” is named after the former WWE bruiser who went on to become the UFC’s reigning supervillain.” But frankly, all that’s important to me is the killer beat and wildly gutsy flow. I’m a man of simple tastes.

Stream the track below and grab the whole Mixtape [here.](http://crashsymbols.bandcamp.com/album/dope-mountain-fuck-vol-2)
